snippet: California officials ordered the recall of 330,000 Toyota and Lexus vehicles today, citing a faulty computer emission control system.    The recall is the largest by the California Air Resources Board, whose emission standards are the nation's str...
lead_paragraph: California officials ordered the recall of 330,000 Toyota and Lexus vehicles today, citing a faulty computer emission control system. The recall is the largest by the California Air Resources Board, whose emission standards are the nation's strictest, a board spokesman, Jerry Martin, said.
abstract: California officials order recall of 330,000 Toyota and Lexus vehicles, citing faulty computer emission control system (S)

headline.main: California Orders Large Recall for Toyota
